# TQM Lectures 2024 {.unnumbered}


These are the materials for Theories of Quantum Matter in Michaelmas 2024.

## Lectures {.unnumbered}

Take place in the Small Lecture Theatre at the Cavendish Laboratory from 09.30-11.00 on Tuesdays and Thursdays.

## Supervisions {.unnumbered}

There will be four supervisions, taking place in the weeks commencing 22/10, 5/11, 19/11, and 3/12.
